name: Zombie Defence v0.33
description:
Browser Version has been temporarily disabled

Welcome to Zombie Defence, yep... it's a very creative name. Zombie Defence is a wave-based tower defence game where you expand your city and defend against the armies of zombies. Build up your defences during the day and defend against the undead hoards at night.

In terms of content, there isn't much, but... nope that's it. 

Features:
- Procedurally Generated Environments
- 10+ Zombie Types
- Special Zombies
- Boss Zombie
- Building System
- Building Upgrade System
- "Fun Prize System" (Totally not a gambling system)
- Save/Load System (Yep, this apparently a feature now)
- Day/Night Cycle

Developed by AveragePiglet & Atroxit
